name: todo-jsonl
description: todo list manager on the command-line inspired by todo.txt using the jsonl format

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run optimize && npm run assemble
scripts.compile: opal --require date --require json --compile todo.js.rb | grep -v "//# sourceMappingURL" > todo.js
scripts.optimize: java -jar closure-compiler.jar --isolation_mode IIFE --warning_level QUIET --js todo.js --js_output_file todo.min.js
scripts.assemble: node -e "console.log('#!/usr/bin/env node')" > todo.js && cat todo.min.js >> todo.js && rm todo.min.js

author: Gabor Bata
